name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (alerdn)
description:
The good and old Tic Tac Toe Number of players

2 - no 'VS computer' mode!

Controls

Just your mouse.

This is a simple open-source game made for a job test, check out the repository if you want to know how to do one of this.

Github repository

https://github.com/alerdn/tic-tac-toe-mks
